divs: Sighting DetailsThe attached photos were all taken on the morning of Feb 27, 2012. The first photo was taken from my back window before I left for work. The other two were taken when I got to work. My office window faces west with a view of Edmonton. The question is not, "Do they exist?", but "Why have they suddenly taken such an interest in the Edmonton area?"
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There was one other sighting in Edmonton on or around February 27th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: UFO activity is increasing over the Edmonton area.
